title: Maximum 40% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F
clause_text: Maximum 40% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F.S.I. may be permitted for allied services / support services including commercial and residential activities except polluting activities in IT Parks. Remaining built-up area shall be utilized for IT / ITES / Data center.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
